com.qtplaf.library.database

Interface DatabaseProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XMLDatabaseProvider

    public interface DatabaseProvider
    The DatabaseProvider defines an interface to provide meta data information at the level of fields, tables and views. Implementations may use any persistence media, like XML files or a database connection.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas

      • getTable

        Table getTable(java.lang.String schema,
               java.lang.String name)
        throws java.lang.Exception
        Returns a table definition. This is a simplified version for providers with a single catalog and several schemas.
        Parameters:
        schema - The schema name.
        name - The table name.
        Returns:
        The table definition or null if not found.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If any persistence error occurs.
